title: TD Jakes Hope for Every Moment
creator: Destiny Image

extendedInfo.description: Receive hope and encouragement every day of the year, from New York Times bestselling author, speaker, and preacher T.D. Jakes.This version features an automatic daily reminder, bookmarks for your favorite verses and devotionals, and the ability to share what you read via e-mail and Facebook. You can even go back to previous days, or skip ahead!Have a feature suggestion or idea? Let us know!
